entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Light up `Ascii.Utility` methods with `Vector512` code paths. #89280
  • Add optimization for scalar conversion of `float`/`double` to `ulong`. #89279
  • [ComInterfaceGenerator] Garbage HRESULT Returned without PreserveSig #89276
  • Configuration binding source generator doesn't handle generics correctly #89273
    8.0.0
  • GC deadlock on spawning new process on OSX #89272
  • ComInterfaceGenerator assumes [In, Out] for arrays of blittable elements that are pinned in ManagedToUnmanaged, but doesn't implement [In, Out] in UnmanagedToManaged #89265
  • [API Proposal]: Add extensions to create an OptionsBuilder with ValidateOnStart support #89263
    8.0.0
  • `Uri.GetLeftPart(Authority)` returns a wrong result for some schemes #89262
    Future
  • [perf] Microsoft.Extensions** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89252
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Collections.** and System.Buffers.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89251
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Globalization.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89250
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.IO.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89249
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Linq.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89248
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Memory.Span.** and System.Memory.ReadOnly.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89247
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Numerics.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89246
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Runtime.Intrinsics.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89245
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Security.Cryptography.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89244
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Tests.Perf.** and System.Perf.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89243
    8.0.0
  • [perf] System.Text.** performance regressions in Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89242
    8.0.0
  • [perf] Overview of Mono AOT x64 microbenchmarks from Preview 5 to Preview 7 #89238
    8.0.0
  • [Android][Test Failure] System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.HttpMetricsTest_Http11_Async.AllSocketsHttpHandlerCounters_Success_Recorded #89237
  • [Perf] Windows/arm64: 28 Regressions on 7/18/2023 1:13:00 AM #89259
  • Move tests from full facade assemblies into type forward destination #89230
  • Thread statics are no longer visible in debugger #89227
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Supply set of TypeConverters during configuration binding #89254
  • Add optimization for vector conversion of `uint`/`ulong` to `float`/`double`. #89277
  • HttpClient changes the case of x-request-id when it is added to the DefaultRequestHeaders collection #89256
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: HttpMethod.From(string) #89161
    9.0.0
  • JIT: Bad codegen with loop #75442
    8.0.0
  • JIT: Late expansion of delegate calls can reorder null checks with other argument exceptions #75832
    8.0.0
  • Regressions in System.Buffers.Text.Tests.Utf8ParserTests #89261
  • ICorProfilerCallback.AssemblyUnloadStarted is never called #86178
    8.0.0
  • Add the support of DateOnly and TimeOnly types in TryParse method Utf8Parser class #53768
    Future
  • DI : add support to eager load a singleton service #43149
    8.0.0
  • PublishAot with a specific Runtime version is broken #89040
  • Regressions in System.Formats.Tar.Tests.Perf_TarFile #88672
    8.0.0
  • Follow up on TarEntry feedback from PR #87534 #87835
    8.0.0
  • PerformanceCounterCategory.ReadCategory is taking large memory allocation #79660
    Future
  • Unable to TarFile.ExtractToDirectoryAsync when it contains symbolic link file points to an absolute path #86724
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Make LargeArrayBuilder public #87361
  • [API Proposal]: Recover JsonNode from string path #87749
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Incorrect optimization prints `35514` instead of `28876` #85382
    8.0.0
  • Test failure JIT/Regression/JitBlue/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693/Runtime_84693.dll #85081
    8.0.0
  • Unable to clean up running docker containers #87323
    8.0.0
  • [release/3.1] CI Failure: System.Diagnostics.EventLog #77234
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Ship IPNetwork downlevel for netstandard2.0 #88965
    8.0.0
  • Process.WaitForExit always times out after a different particular process runs #88862
  • Scoped service should not be resolvable from root provider #89109
    8.0.0
  • 1sec Long Pause (stop-the-world) on Gen1 GC #88426
    9.0.0
  • [Android] Uncaught exception crashes an app without printing correct stack trace #69601
    8.0.0
  • Stream.Read - document 0-byte reads #89233
  • R2R: Cache target of indirect cell address to optimize redundant cell address loading #38890
    Future
  • CI failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests - Operation timeout #75611
    8.0.0
  • Test failure in System.Net.Http.Functional.Tests.SyncHttpHandler_HttpClientHandler_Cancellation_Test.GetAsync_CancelDuringResponseBodyReceived_Unbuffered_TaskCanceledQuickly #74122
    8.0.0
  • SslStream now does zero byte read of InnerStream which breaks WCF #88792
    8.0.0
  • "native" instruction set alias for AOT compilers #73246
    8.0.0
  • Trimming and extensions compatibility design – discussion #86649
    8.0.0
  • Support more date-time formats for JSON deserialization #85545
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix TraceSwitch to synchronize the Value and Level properties #89278
    area-System.Diagnostics.TraceSource, 8.0.0
  • JIT: Fix handling of filter successors #89275
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize MemoryMarshal.ToEnumerable for arrays and strings #89274
    area-System.Memory
  • Trying to add a win/arm64 job for wbt #89271
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, needs-area-label
  • [NativeAOT] Upstream some changes to portable allocation helpers #89269
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add workaround for broken SPNEGO in IBM WebSphere #89268
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Use managed NTLM/SPNEGO on Apple platforms by default #89267
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Filter list of candidate invocations for parsing in binding generator #89266
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE] Investigate returning ConnectionError instead NameResolution #89260
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-System.Net.Http
  • Implement new streaming APIs for the `System.Net.Http.Json` extensions #89258
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [browser][non-icu] `HybridGlobalization` calendar data #89255
    arch-wasm, area-System.Globalization
  • [Android] Enable skipped networking tests #89232
    area-System.Net, os-android, 8.0.0
  • Fix GC hole with `filter` liveness #89228
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Merged

  • Add HttpMethod.Parse #89270
    area-System.Net.Http, new-api-needs-documentation
  • JIT: Cache memory dependencies for VN map selects #89241
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Expand inlined delegate calls in correct order #89175
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Bump main version to RC1 #89151
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fire AssemblyUnloadStarted event #87890
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Workaround a C++/CLI bug involving DIMs #89264
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Numerics, 8.0.0
  • Workaround a C++/CLI bug involving DIMs #89253
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Filter list of candidate invocations for parsing in binding generator #89226
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Add lock when allocating from method mempool #89231
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [JIT] Fix - Do not remove `CAST` nodes on store if the `LCL_VAR` is a parameter or struct field #85734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [PERF] Finish fixing PerfBDNApp, continuation of #89057 #89135
    area-Infrastructure
  • [browser] Allow download retry+throttling in unified code with blazor #88910
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 8.0.0
  • Enable CLS Compliance on Diagnostics Libraries #89214
    area-System.Diagnostics, 8.0.0
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Remove more duplicate assets from NativeAOT runtime pack build #89240
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-installer
  • Remove more duplicate assets from NativeAOT runtime pack build #89239
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Efcore issue 31178 #89185
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, community-contribution
  • Fix incorrect nativeaot event thread / sequence number on shutdown #88941
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • SBLK_MASK_LOCK_THREADID allow tid up to 65535 #88772
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Broaden use of SearchValues in TryFindNextPossibleStartingPosition in Regex #89205
    area-System.Text.RegularExpressions, 8.0.0
  • [AndroidAppBuilder] add missing includes to template #89197
    os-android, area-Build-mono
  • Add support for `--instruction-set:native` #87865
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Reduce ProbabilisticWithAsciiCharSearchValues overhead on non-ASCII texts #89224
    area-System.Buffers, 8.0.0
  • Point ActiveIssues to moved issues #89158
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add more tests for complex dict element binding by generator #89210
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0

Updated

  • Virt call unsafe accessor tests #89220
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 8.0.0
  • Crossgen2 support for static virtual method resolution (take 2) #87438
    area-crossgen2-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use live illink for trimming tests #88929
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Generates a guid for activity id #88838
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT createdump fork/exec for crash dump generation #89203
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Enable IOPack, IOEnqueue, and IODequeue on Windows #88894
    area-System.Threading
  • [Mono][WIP] UnsafeAccessor: Support ambiguous method match #89217
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [RISC-V] Fix GetArgLoc #88657
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Allow multiple kmask registers to be allocated and cleanup some codegen around them #89059
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Handle Vector multiplication for long/ulong as intrinsic on pre-AVX512 hardware #87142
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Unbox a true nullable without Opcodes.Unbox #89108
    area-System.Reflection
  • Don't fallback to PNSE, and give a more descriptive error message. #88804
    area-Serialization, 8.0.0
  • Move full facade assemblies into src/libraries/shims #89184
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Implement RandomAccess.FlushToDisk() #89100
    area-System.IO, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Add the interop tags to the "add to the AppModel project" automation #89221
    area-Meta
  • [mono][jit] Enabled more intrinsics for V4 on arm64 #88912
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix issue references in ConvertToLibraryImportAnalyzerTests #89225
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 8.0.0
  • Enable use-after-return checking in ASAN #89204
    area-Infrastructure
  • Try to improve EventSource_ParallelRequests_LogsNewConnectionIdForEachRequest reliability #89192
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [6.0 port] #88486
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 6.0.21
  • [release/6.0-staging] dotnet.exe prints error messages to console when launched with empty DOTNET_MULTILEVEL_LOOKUP #88664
    Servicing-approved, area-Host, 6.0.21
  • Write perfmap and jitdump files to /tmp by default [7.0 port] #89053
    Servicing-approved, area-Tracing-coreclr, 7.0.11
  • Use utf conversions from minipal #89036
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use proper context in initClass for GDV #87847
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [TEST] noop change to see if tests are passing #85694
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW
  • Port NativeAOT exception handling to CoreCLR #88034
    area-ExceptionHandling-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Use RegDeleteTree in RegistryKey.DeleteSubKeyTree #82598
    area-Microsoft.Win32, community-contribution
  • Try to fix missing libc++.so.1 errors in arm64 llvmaot perf run #88705
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Include TypeNameBuilder.cs from CoreLib instead of copying the file over #89144
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • [mono][tests] Parallel AOT compilation of runtime tests on iOS platforms #86089
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 8.0.0
  • Combine writes in `WidenAsciiToUtf16` #88502
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • Add Unsafe.IsAddressLess/GreaterThanOrEqualTo methods #89156
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [RISC-V][JIT] Fix NaN canonicalization issue #88510
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Remove incorrect flag setting #88878
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Flow TasksConfiguration in build & specify generator config #84931
    area-Infrastructure
  • adding clrgc variant with regions enabled #89129
    area-GC-coreclr
  • add SendTo/ReceiveFrom with SocketAddress #88970
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Address unused suppressions #89216
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add retries to the NodeJS download task #2349
  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: Native lib - what sets tls_CurrentThread #2347

PullRequests

Created

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Add retrying to the NodeJS download #2350
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement more efficient null-checking and use inbounds GEPs #2348

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Implement exception dispatch info support #2341
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Fix an EH bug #2344
  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove size overflow checks from Align8 helpers #2345
    area-NativeAOT-LLVM

Updated

  • ManagedZLib Experiment #2325
    area-ManagedZLib

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Configuration binder source generator enabled in Blazor WASM #34135
  • Native AOT doesn't work with Windows Forms #34129
  • Difference in restore behaviour with same SDK version #34121

Closed

  • Pre-install some packages in the global cache but dotnet restore runtime is increasing #34127
  • Updating sign tool to 0.9.0-beta.23127.3 gives stack dump #31168

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs to 6.0.4 #34144
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Bump System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs to 6.0.4 #34143
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0.1xx-preview7] Disable ConfigurationBinder source generator in Blazor WASM #34142
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Revert "#30336 Default Dotnet Tool to Run on Latest Runtime - Build time change" #34132
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
  • Include Mac in AOT testing #34130
    untriaged, Area-NativeAOT

Merged

  • Run net472 Microsoft.NET.Build.Containers.IntegrationTests on full framework leg #34122
    Area-Containers
  • Update Container User Id to react to changes in dotnet/dotnet-docker#4715 #34128
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, 8.0.1xx
  • Containers: improved `DockerRegistryManager` for tests reliability #33955
    untriaged, Area-Containers

Updated

  • Bump Verify.Xunit from 20.4.0 to 20.5.1 in /eng/dependabot #34047
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, dependencies, Branch Lockdown, dependabot: 7.0.4xx
  • Add workload version subcommand Fixes #33912 #33996
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • Switch the VM image of the macOS #33783
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Replace rollForward in tools runtimeconfig #24817
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Add separate warnings for settings that depend on illink pack #34077
    untriaged, Area-ILLink
  • Do a two-phase publish to mimic VS behavior #29817
    breaking-change, Area-NetSDK

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Declaration of ref/out parameters in lambdas without typename #338
    Any Time
  • [Proposal]: Collection literals #5354
    Working Set
  • Primary Constructors #2691
    Working Set
  • Champion "readonly for locals and parameters" #188
    Backlog
  • [Proposal]: Interceptors #7009

PullRequests

Created

  • Clarify "movable" property of inline array elements #7362

Merged

  • Extended dates #7361

Updated

  • Define capture behavior when primary ctor bypassed #7354
  • Ref assignment switch expressions #7352
  • Update `ref readonly` parameters proposal #7350

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Don't give a diagnostic for inability to convert to an error type #69138
    Compiler.Next
  • LSIF generator can sometimes write non-LSIF to stdout #69137
  • Report diagnostic for collection expression with collection initializer target type where Add() returns a value #69136
  • [SUGGESTION] Add refactorings: extract interface and implement interface #69135
  • [BUG] c# dev kit - high memory usage #69134
  • Error when using collection-expression for an array-typed attribute argument. #69133
    17.8
  • Analyzer/Fixer to convert existing code to collection expressions. #69132
  • Unexpected CS1573 with XML docs that are already inherited #69126
  • Cannot paste tabs into editor anymore #69124
  • Dotnet build uses old version of a source generator dll during build #69123

Closed

  • Inconsistent behavior of CS0219 and IDE0059 #69129
  • Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.LanguageServer is not reporting capabilities according to lsp-spec. #68849
  • Surface a warning at the declaration site for members that will be hidden by the language `[InlineArray]` support #68868
    C# 12.0
  • Correct way to rename a file in a code fix #6261
    Backlog
  • Renaming a document? #69125

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable bootstrapped builds #69130
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Implement extension indexer access #69122
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Localize the output of run tests #69121
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Fix dotnet test SDK resolution when server starts as dll #69120
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Disable test codelens when devkit is enabled #69119
    Area-IDE, untriaged

Merged

  • Add test for Experimental usage in Experimental method #69131
    Area-Compilers, Test, untriaged, Next
  • Improve EnC analysis to handle active statements in primary constructors #69028
    Area-Interactive, untriaged, Next
  • LSP: add empty commands array to ServerCapabilites.ExecuteCommandProvider #69128
    Community, Next
  • Implement `IsMoveableVariable` check for inline array element access. #69098
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Rename collection literals to collection expressions #69114
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Next
  • Warn that a user-defined API on an inline array type won’t be used by the language for an element access expression #69064
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Inline Arrays, Next
  • Add support for IDE scenarios related to `ref readonly` parameters #69085
    Area-IDE, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0

Updated

  • Collection literals: collection builder methods #68930
    Area-Compilers, untriaged
  • Remove tracking link to issue 44902 #69095
    Area-Compilers
  • Avoid binding lambdas unnecessarily in some error scenarios #59733
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Initial support for a set of analyzers/fixers to update existing code to use collection expressions. #69118
    Area-Analyzers, Story, untriaged
  • Require `SizeConst` for `UnmanagedType.ByValArray` #68992
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Backlog
  • Source generators/track values etw #68830
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Add fuzzer for incremental generators #68903
    Area-Compilers, 17.8
  • Lazily calculate preview operations #68214
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Suppress `ref readonly` warning for extension method receiver #69083
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, 17.8
  • Relax method conversions with ref readonly parameters #69020
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters
  • Allow parsing `ref readonly` parameters in `cref` #69104
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Ref Readonly Parameters, C# 12.0
  • Avoid creating a result temp for is-expressions #68694
    Area-Compilers, Community, 17.8
  • Update ICSharpCode.Decompiler to 7.2.1.6856 (#67875) #69065

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add diagnostic ID to obsolete in SecurityTokenValidators #49558
  • NavMenu toggler doesn't work in Blazor Web App #49556
  • Blazor server localization not working correctly when using alternate folder for storing resource files #49550
  • Consider adding PIN as an option in Identity infrastructure as it is required in most of the projects now #49549
  • Accessibility testing for the Blazor Web template #49548
    8.0-rc2
  • Add ambiguity breaker (hook) in DefaultEndpointSelector #49547
  • SupplyParameterFromForm should also support binding data from the query string #49546
  • [Blazor] Ignore read only properties in form mapping #49545
  • Revamping form-binding in minimal APIs and MVC #49543
    8.0-rc1
  • Blazor Server: Read image saved as blob as base 64 string #49552
  • When using the `WebApplicationFactory`'s `HttpClient` the resulting `RequestMessage`'s contents are empty #49537
  • How to get http request headers accept value? #49535
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps #49534
  • Perf improvement: plainTextSansFilter #49533
  • WebApiAot source name not updated #49529

Closed

  • Don't break interactive components when their parent static content is updated #48764
    8.0-preview7
  • Start interactive components that were added dynamically #48763
    8.0-preview7
  • Blazor template with 3 projects : Client , Server , Shared in .net 8 Preview 6 #49540
  • The Blazor Server application runs significantly slower when using the HttpSys server #48799
  • app.use(xxxx) will not make project return 405 error in Asp.Net Core Middle ware. #49536
  • .net 8 P4 Brotli compress task not functioning as in previous previews #48308
    Discussions
  • Perf regression: connectionclose, json, json #49496
  • Generic Host Building is the complete opposite of clean code #49366
  • Upload build artifact with build info in 2.1 #49347
    2.1.x
  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49237
    8.0-preview7

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0-preview7] [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49557
    area-blazor
  • Update _LoginPartial.Identity.cshtml with correct returnUrl #49553
    area-ui-rendering
  • Update JwtBearer, WsFed, and OIDC handlers to use identity model 7 #49542
    Servicing-approved, area-security, community-contribution
  • Update JwtBearer, WsFed, and OIDC handlers to use identity model 7 #49541
    area-security, community-contribution
  • Remove array allocation from RouteValueDictionary when < 5 route values #49539
    area-runtime

Merged

  • Use correct case in ILCompiler package name #49555
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • [Blazor] Improvements to the interaction between SSR and interactive rendering #49238
    area-blazor, 8.0-rc1
  • [release/8.0-preview7] Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49530
    Servicing-approved, area-infrastructure, area-middleware, 8.0-preview7
  • Add support for anti-forgery middleware #49233
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc1
  • Reduce allocations in AuthorizationPolicyBuilder.Combine #49517
    Perf, area-security, 8.0-rc1
  • Update BuildErrors.md #49527
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-rc1
  • Update Wilson7 branch #49524
    area-security
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2225374 #49521
    area-mvc, 8.0-rc1

Updated

  • [Blazor] Support for determining the render mode dynamically #49477
    area-blazor
  • Redis distributed/output cache: include scenario in connection metadata #49291
    area-runtime, feature-output-caching
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-preview.7.23364.32 #49470
    area-infrastructure
  • Clarify API docs for OnAfterRender #49519
    area-blazor
  • Improve HttpContextAccessor debugging #49430
    area-runtime
  • Enable IDE0005 analyzer in the build #49080
    area-infrastructure, pending-ci-rerun

entry.title: dotnet/diagnostics - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • LLDB sos commands don't write output to SBCommandReturnObject #4086
    8.0.0

Closed

  • Add support for TcpIP in all tooling using ReverseDiagnosticsServer. #2160
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Enable Binskim scan in CI builds #4087

Updated

  • Add Support For Multiplexing `System.Diagnostics.Metrics` for `Dotnet Monitor` and `Dotnet Counters` #3889
  • Extend dotnet-gcdump support for mobile and dotnet-dsrouter scenarios. #4081

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom commands are not invoked for some controls #16268
  • Hot-Reload Not Detecting XAML Changes #16267
  • How to retrieve cookies in response message of a WebView #16266
  • CommandMapper.Add() causes stack overflow #16263
  • Picker in MacCatalyst doesn't select the SelectedItem #16261
  • Maui 8 preview 6 Visual studio 2022 preview 4 - Cannot build android or iOS blank app (windows host) #16259
  • Tab key doesn't move between Entry fields on Mac Catalyst #16255
  • 'Binding Command' in MenuFlyoutItem works only once #16254
  • Exception of type 'Interop+AndroidCrypto+SslException' was thrown in .NET MAUI 8.0 preview #16253
  • Touchscreen not working after rapidly clicking while app startup #16251
    Backlog
  • BackgroundColor of a Label doesn't work in Release on iOS IMMEDIATE ATTENTION REQUIRED! #16250
  • Home Indicator Auto Hidden Not Working In MAUI #16247
  • Flyout Page: Tap gesture not working on iOS in split mode when setting FlyoutOverlapsDetailsInPopoverMode to false #16246
  • Appium tests do not detect content inside Flyout Detail on iOS #16245
  • MAUI 7.0.92 requires Microsoft.Extensions.Logging.Abstractions 7.0.0 while .NET 7.0.9 7.0.1 #16244

PullRequests

Created

  • [ios] fix memory leak in TimePicker #16265

  • Add a Mac Catalyst device test run #16260

  • [net8.0] Bump Microsoft.Extensions packages #16257
    area/upstream, dependencies, 8.0-preview7
  • [Android] Fix default Switch Style #16252
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/templates 📄, area/controls 🎮, control-switch

Merged

  • TextTransform set before Text #16248
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Don't use loaded/unloaded on FlyoutPage #16241
    area/FlyoutPage

Updated

  • Internalize RealParent #16269
  • Move most controls to use ModifyMapping (and variants) #15058
    area/controls 🎮
  • Prevent Android timer from adding multiple callbacks #16078
  • [iOS] Add updates for LineHeight, TextDecorations, CharacterSpacing #16223
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, community ✨, control-label
  • [Windows] fixing window glitches while moving or resizing #14861
    platform/windows 🪟, area/desktop 🖥️, community ✨
  • [Bug] Fix Grid cells not honoring MaxWidth #16215
    area/layout 🔲, layout-grid
  • [net7.0] Set the SafeAreaInset Property with updated value (#15512) #16238
  • [Windows] Fix SwipeView DeviceTests #16226
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎, control-swipeview
  • Use AppendToMapping for Element and VisualElement #14948
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, platform/tizen
  • [net8.0] Merge main into net8.0 #16144
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, 8.0-preview7
  • [iOS] Changes in Border clipping part #15856
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-border, i/regression
  • Add a UI test for tapping on a label span #16222
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Fix issues with ScrollView on ios that does not correctly resize when… #15460
    area/layout 🔲, community ✨

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Query pipeline architecture issues #31327
  • Query: convert identifiers to be generic SqlExpressions rather than ColumnExpressions #31326
  • .Contains() on a simple List<T> within a LINQ query Where clause results in Microsoft.Data.SqlClient.SqlException: 'Incorrect syntax near '$'.' #31323
  • Throw more specific error when attempting to leverage 'ExecuteUpdate/Delete' methods with InMemory provider #31320
  • Include if a migration has destructive operations in `ef migrations list --json` #31319

Closed

  • Json: BigModel_with_JSON_columns test fails to find JsonValueReaderWriter when processing compiled model #31201
    8.0.0
  • Stackoverflow exception on OrderBy with expression #31307
  • GroupBy().Select().Where() works for simple POCOs but not when using a class or record with a constructor for initialization #31279
  • Json serialisation throws an error when Sqlite package is included #31313
  • [Q]: Why? `InvalidCastException: Unable to cast object of type 'System.Int32' to type 'System.String'.` #31293

PullRequests

Created

  • More changes from API review #31324
    auto-merge
  • Translate generic math calls using the existing Math translators #31322
  • Fix to #31100 - Switch to storing enums as ints in JSON instead of strings #31317

Merged

  • Fix NativeAOT warnings in EFCore.Abstractions #31321
    auto-merge
  • Update SDK to 8.0.100-rc.1.23370.3 #31284
    area-infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Re-enable BigModel_with_JSON_columns #31318

Updated

  • Fix to #30922 - Most cases of projecting a primitive collection don't work #31263
  • Feature/translate json functions #29306 #30010
    waiting-for-response
  • Add DateOnly.ToString / TimeOnly.ToString query mapping for SQL Server #31289

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-07-20
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • update the preview download column to p7 now that main has advanced to rc branding #17031

Merged

  • Exclude vstest licenses directory from VMR #17023
